me.lihq.game

Class Assets

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.lihq.game.Assets

  • public class Assets
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines the assets that the game uses.

      static com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion UP_ARROW
      These TextureRegions store the 4 different directions that the room changing arrows can face.
